name: Zearch Solutions
overview:
Zearch Solutions is a software company specialized in custom software development, portal development, web design, Internet/Intranet applications and consulting services. The company has experience in the development of complex solutions for its customers - implementation of concepts for data security, corporate and virtual private networks, databases and software development.

They create modern software products for business management, based on Client/Server and Internet/Intranet technology decisions in accordance with the leading world standards in the field of IT. They create Internet sites led by the demands of our clients - with advertisement exposure, aimed at marketing or containing database. Search Solutions provide planning, professional development and management of web sites plus hosting, search engine marketing, updating and support.
